name: Web Douban FM
description: Douban FM is a personalized music tool developed by Douban. While listening, Douban FM will know the preferences of user by "heart", "dustbin" or "skip". Based on the user's operation and feedback, Douban FM will select and play music from a massive music collection suitable for the user .

en_US.description: Douban FM is a personalized music tool developed by Douban. While listening, Douban FM will know the preferences of user by "heart", "dustbin" or "skip". Based on the user's operation and feedback, Douban FM will select and play music from a massive music collection suitable for the user .
en_US.name: Web Douban FM

zh_CN.description: 豆瓣FM是一款由豆瓣开发的个性化的音乐收听工具。在收听的过程中，用户可以用“红心”、“垃圾桶”或者“跳过” 告诉豆瓣FM用户的喜好。豆瓣FM将根据用户的操作和反馈，从海量曲库中自动发现并播出符合用户音乐口味的歌曲。
zh_CN.name: 豆瓣FM网页版
